control_attributes.control_description: The organization: (a) Notifies terminated individuals of applicable, legally binding post-employment requirements for the protection of organizational information; and(b) Requires terminated individuals to sign an acknowledgment of post-employment requirements as part of the organizational termination process.

Control Statement: The organization: (a) Notifies terminated individuals of applicable, legally binding post-employment requirements for the protection of organizational information; and(b) Requires terminated individuals to sign an acknowledgment of post-employment requirements as part of the organizational termination process.
